title: typefaces with ch ligature
content:
Hi,

I’m looking for as many different typefaces as possible with a disretionary ch ligature, the only one i know so far is dstype’s esta. I’d be really greatful if anyone could let me know of any more.

Thanks,

Clare.

 [‹ Music for Designing: New CD cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104749/http:/typophile.com/node/20597 "Go to previous forum topic") [Constructed record label logotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104749/http:/typophile.com/node/20509 "Go to next forum topic")
author: clare.holmes

comments.content: you dont really give too much information what you are looking for, but i asked for something similar a few days ago, you can find the thread [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104749/http:/typophile.com/node/20526).
